== Kanjiramkulam (CT) (628545) ==

Kanjiramkulam (CT) is a town in the [[Neyyattinkara]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 9.69 sq. km. and harbouring 5197 households with total population of 19902 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 23 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 23 km. Male population is 9795 and female population is 10107. Scheduled Caste population is 1510 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the town is 628545<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 23 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 23 km. Railway station is at Balaramapuram at a distance of 6 km.
